Issue.creator: mastersingh24
Issue.summary: Support for Anonymity and Unlinkability of Transactions
Issue.description: There are many use cases where users of Fabric do not want to persist the true identity of the transactor to the ledger but at the same time need to be able to make authentication and authorization decisions based on whatever credentials are used. Additionally, one should not be able to link transactions (even to a pseudo-anonymous identity) just by looking at the transactions in the ledger.
